name: Outlet Hero
description:
This game was made at Ludum Dare 46  in 3 days.

Outlet Hero is a third person shooter, the goal is to not let your battery die out.

StoryYou are Chad Man, a hero who was sent to infiltrate the newbuilt citadel of Dr. W. Irgin, and destroy it before it is in full power!

Controls
WASD- move
Mouse - aim
LMB - shoot
RMB - grab

Authors
Korteh (@superkorteh): art, game design, level design
OmicronPerson (@OmicronPerson): animation, code, gamedesign
ASTRO (@elysian_tunes): Music, SFX

Ost link
mega
